attributes.action: Make immigrants worthy of our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every immigrant no matter where they are from should speak english, have a skill we need, or enough money to live here without bennifits for at least five years. if they are marrying an british citizen same applys with the citizen responisble for upkeep of immigrant. All immigrants here with no skills should earn the right to stay by being given army training and sent to fight for the country. if they don't want to do that we don't want them and they should be put on the next plane out with a available seat.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on immigrants and immigration
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=immigration
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=immigrant
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
